attributes.action: ensure justice for Baby P and show us you are a strong leader
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure that the people responsible for Baby P 's death are brought to justice, from his parents and their partners/friends to the GP and social workers that neglected him and failed him so horribly.This cannot be happening in this society.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
